title: Cannot INSTALL pytorch on ubuntu18.04(nvcc -ccbin clang-3.8)
body_html:
When I try to install the pytorch I have a problem as fellow.

Bug

running install
running build_deps

  • WITH_CUDA=0
  • [[ --with-cuda == --\w\i\t\h-\c\u\d\a ]]
  • WITH_CUDA=1
  • shift
  • WITH_ROCM=0
  • [[ --with-nnpack == --\w\i\t\h-\r\o\c\m ]]
  • WITH_NNPACK=0
  • [[ --with-nnpack == --\w\i\t\h-\n\n\p\a\c\k ]]
  • WITH_NNPACK=1
  • shift
  • WITH_MKLDNN=0
  • [[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\m\k\l\d\n\n ]]
  • WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS=0
  • [[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\g\l\o\o-\i\b\v\e\r\b\s ]]
  • WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW=0
  • [[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\d\i\s\t\r\i\b\u\t\e\d-\m\w ]]
  • CMAKE_INSTALL='make install'
  • USER_CFLAGS=
  • USER_LDFLAGS=
  • [[ -n '' ]]
  • [[ -n '' ]]
  • [[ -n '' ]]
    ++ dirname tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
  • cd tools/..
    +++ pwd
    ++ printf '%q\n' /home/leexy/github/pytorch
  • PWD=/home/leexy/github/pytorch
  • BASE_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch
  • TORCH_LIB_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib
  • INSTALL_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
  • THIRD_PARTY_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/third_party
  • CMAKE_VERSION=cmake
  • C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN"'
  • C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'
  • LDFLAGS='-L"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib" '
  • LD_POSTFIX=.so.1
  • LD_POSTFIX_UNVERSIONED=.so
    ++ uname
  • [[ Linux == \D\a\r\w\i\n ]]
  • LDFLAGS='-L"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib" -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN'
  • CPP_FLAGS=' -std=c++11 '
  • GLOO_FLAGS=
  • THD_FLAGS=
  • NCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install

  • GLOO_FLAGS='-DUSE_CUDA=1 -DNCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install'
  • [[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
  • [[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
  • CWRAP_FILES='/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Declarations.cwrap;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/THNN.h;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/nn.yaml'
  • CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'

  • '[' -z 8 ']'
  • BUILD_TYPE=Release
  • [[ -n '' ]]
  • [[ -n '' ]]
  • echo 'Building in Release mode'
    Building in Release mode
  • mkdir -p torch/lib/tmp_install
  • for arg in "$@"
  • [[ nccl == \n\c\c\l ]]
  • pushd /home/leexy/github/pytorch/third_party
    ~/github/pytorch/third_party ~/github/pytorch
  • build_nccl
  • mkdir -p build/nccl
  • pushd build/nccl
    ~/github/pytorch/third_party/build/nccl ~/github/pytorch/third_party ~/github/pytorch
  • cmake ../../nccl -DCMAKE_MODULE_PATH=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install '-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS= -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 ' '-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS= -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 -std=c++11 ' -DCMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS=

body_text:
When I try to install the pytorch I have a problem as fellow.
Bug
running install
running build_deps

WITH_CUDA=0
[[ --with-cuda == --\w\i\t\h-\c\u\d\a ]]
WITH_CUDA=1
shift
WITH_ROCM=0
[[ --with-nnpack == --\w\i\t\h-\r\o\c\m ]]
WITH_NNPACK=0
[[ --with-nnpack == --\w\i\t\h-\n\n\p\a\c\k ]]
WITH_NNPACK=1
shift
WITH_MKLDNN=0
[[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\m\k\l\d\n\n ]]
WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS=0
[[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\g\l\o\o-\i\b\v\e\r\b\s ]]
WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW=0
[[ nccl == --\w\i\t\h-\d\i\s\t\r\i\b\u\t\e\d-\m\w ]]
CMAKE_INSTALL='make install'
USER_CFLAGS=
USER_LDFLAGS=
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
++ dirname tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
cd tools/..
+++ pwd
++ printf '%q\n' /home/leexy/github/pytorch
PWD=/home/leexy/github/pytorch
BASE_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch
TORCH_LIB_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib
INSTALL_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
THIRD_PARTY_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/third_party
CMAKE_VERSION=cmake
C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN"'
C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'
LDFLAGS='-L"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib" '
LD_POSTFIX=.so.1
LD_POSTFIX_UNVERSIONED=.so
++ uname
[[ Linux == \D\a\r\w\i\n ]]
LDFLAGS='-L"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN'
CPP_FLAGS=' -std=c++11 '
GLOO_FLAGS=
THD_FLAGS=
NCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
[[ 1 -eq 1 ]]
GLOO_FLAGS='-DUSE_CUDA=1 -DNCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install'
[[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
[[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
CWRAP_FILES='/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Declarations.cwrap;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/THNN.h;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h;/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/nn.yaml'
CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'
[[ '' -eq 1 ]]
'[' -z 8 ']'
BUILD_TYPE=Release
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
echo 'Building in Release mode'
Building in Release mode
mkdir -p torch/lib/tmp_install
for arg in "$@"
[[ nccl == \n\c\c\l ]]
pushd /home/leexy/github/pytorch/third_party
~/github/pytorch/third_party ~/github/pytorch
build_nccl
mkdir -p build/nccl
pushd build/nccl
~/github/pytorch/third_party/build/nccl ~/github/pytorch/third_party ~/github/pytorch
cmake ../../nccl -DCMAKE_MODULE_PATH=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install '-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS= -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 ' '-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS= -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/leexy/github/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1  -std=c++11  ' -DCMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS=

make install

body:
When I try to install the pytorch I have a problem as fellow.

## Bug

running install
running build_deps
+ WITH_CUDA=0
+ [[ --with-cuda == \-\-\w\i\t\h\-\c\u\d\a ]]
+ WITH_CUDA=1
+ shift
+ WITH_ROCM=0
+ [[ --with-nnpack == \-\-\w\i\t\h\-\r\o\c\m ]]
+ WITH_NNPACK=0
+ [[ --with-nnpack == \-\-\w\i\t\h\-\n\n\p\a\c\k ]]
+ WITH_NNPACK=1
+ shift
+ WITH_MKLDNN=0
+ [[ nccl == \-\-\w\i\t\h\-\m\k\l\d\n\n ]]

+ WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW=0

+ CMAKE_INSTALL='make install'
+ USER_CFLAGS=
+ USER_LDFLAGS=
+ [[ -n '' ]]
+ [[ -n '' ]]
+ [[ -n '' ]]
++ dirname tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
+ cd tools/..
+++ pwd
